dublin_core.dcvalue: The SMS for Life system is a stock management tool that increases the visibility of antimalarial stock levels at facilities and thereby ensuring District Medical Officers have timely information to manage commodities. The system is configured according to Country needs and priorities and is being implemented in a number of countries across Africa.
Rene Ziegler, Project Manager, SMS for Life, Email: rene.ziegler@novartis.com | jim Barrington, Program Director, SMS for Life, Email: jim.barrington@novartis.com
Cameroon, Ghana, Kenya, Tanzania, Democratic Republic of Congo

Novartis, Ministry of Health United Republic of Tanzania, Medicine for Malaria Ventures (MMV), Swiss Agency for Development and Cooperation, Vodacom Tanzania, IBM, Google, Vodafone, Ghana Health Service, Swiss Tropical and Public Health Institute, Ministry of Public Health Cameroon, Malaria No More, Ministry of Public Health and Sanitation Kenya, Safaricom Kenya, Management Sciences for Health, PSI/PMI, Norad
Data collection and reporting, electronic decision support, Supply chain management, Infectious diseases, Malaria and other vector-borne diseases
